general_info.summary: This document outlines various programs, schools, and administrative functions at Sharda University. It lists key reports and initiatives including the Programme 2025-26, School of Dental Sciences, School of Medical Sciences & Research, Sharda School of Nursing Science & Research, Examination Annual Report, and Academic Bank of Credits (ABC). The text also details university information such as its perspective plan, leadership, history, statutory bodies, tenders, and legal documents, alongside various skill enhancement and awareness programs like language and communication skills, soft skills, technology trends, entrepreneurship, and FM radio. Additionally, it mentions COVID-19 related information, counseling services, mentoring portals, recruiters, and international campuses in Uzbekistan and Agra, as well as specific courses on human values and professional ethics, and the National Cyber Crime Reporting Portal.
